statements: DELETE FROM media_marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 AND return_on_investment < 1000;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE performance_id = 5 AND (date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31')
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 10 AND return_on_investment < 0.5
DELETE FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE campaign_id = 123 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ReturnOnInvestment WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM Conversions WHERE campaign_id = 200 AND number_of_conversions > 5;
DELETE FROM Conversions WHERE user_id = 201 AND campaign_id = 301;
DELETE FROM Conversions WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND user_id = 100;
